_header: Here is a good confession / That teacheth man to salvation
_description: Two couplets prefixed to the Forma Confitendi in prose

BodEngPoeta1.Transcription:
Heer is a good ConfessionÞat techeþ mon to SauacionHow
                    þat mon schal schriuen him hereTo techen him wel þe
                    Maneere

BLAdd37787.Transcription:
Here is a goode confessionThat teches man to saluationHow
                    þat man shalle shryue him hereTo teche him Welle the manere
